title: Is it hypocritical for news publishers to complain about tech companies’ platforms — but still be on them?
description: There is nothing publishers like more than to complain about platforms. Specifically, the tech giants whose apps are on your phone — right where they’d rather you had The Daily Gazette’s app installed. Sometimes the complaints are couched in terms of theft — theft of ad dollars, theft of audience, theft of content. Sometimes it’s...
